package.name: mrpt_localization
package.description: Package for robot 2D self-localization using dynamic or static (MRPT or ROS) maps. The interface is similar to amcl (https://wiki.ros.org/amcl) but supports different particle-filter algorithms, several grid maps at different heights, range-only localization, etc.
package.author: Markus Bader
Raphael Zack
